name: Courtyard by Marriott Sacramento Cal Expo

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The most comfortable bed and pillows we have encountered in a hotel. The property is brand new, so everything is fresh and clean. The bathroom had plenty of room, the shower/tub had the "curved" curtain rod which is so much better than the normal kind. Very nice furnishings and facilities. The area felt very safe. Would stay there again.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel

reviews.text: Nice place - comfortable bed, pretty quiet. I didn't like the door to the bathroom which was on a spring so it kept closing when I wanted to leave it open as I was getting dressed. The breakfast buffet (which isn't included) was excellent. There was no shoehorn in the room, or at least I couldn't find it. Staff was friendly. Very new - still a work in progress.
reviews.title: Nice place

aka: Courtyard By Marriott Sacramento Cal Expo Hotel
